scripts.minify: node_modules/uglify-js/bin/uglifyjs -c -m --comments '/@license/' -- html5-youtube.js > html5-youtube.min.js; node_modules/uglify-js/bin/uglifyjs -c -m --comments '/@license/' -- html5-youtube.compat.js > html5-youtube.compat.min.js

name: html5-youtube
description: YouTube Player API wrapper like HTML5 video API.
author: Ginpei
